\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\&\& {?} \& 0 \&\& {\ker (g^\bullet)} \\
	\& 0 \& {M \otimes I} \& {M \otimes I} \& 0 \& {S^\bullet} \\
	0 \& {M \otimes X} \& {M \oplus (M \otimes  X)} \& {M \otimes A} \& 0 \& {T^\bullet } \\
	\& {M \otimes X} \& {M \otimes Y} \& {M \otimes A/I} \& 0 \& {\mathrm{cok} (g^\bullet)} \\
	\&\& 0 \& 0
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dotted, no head, from=1-4, to=4-2]
	\arrow[from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{g^\bullet }", from=2-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\binom 01}", from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{(1,0)}", two heads, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=3-6, to=4-6]
	\arrow[from=4-2, to=4-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=4-3, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=4-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=4-5]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=5-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
